Posted By: Totema (11/6/2011 1:04:59 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Compare to [Time Elemental](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Time Elemental) in both cost and ability.  
  
It would be \*awesome\* to have both of them out with [Training Grounds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Training Grounds) in EDH.  
Use TE to bounce something hated back into their hand,  
then use Ertai to counter it.  
  
Then again, an [Isochron Scepter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Isochron Scepter) could also cast either [Boomerang](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boomerang) or [Counterspell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Counterspell) for 2,  
without any combos needed (other than the Imprint), and a total CMC of UU less.  
  
I guess it never hurts to have a back-up plan.
posts.html:
Compare to Time Elemental in both cost and ability.

It would be *awesome* to have both of them out with Training Grounds in EDH.
Use TE to bounce something hated back into their hand,
then use Ertai to counter it.

Then again, an Isochron Scepter could also cast either Boomerang or Counterspell for 2,
without any combos needed (other than the Imprint), and a total CMC of UU less.

I guess it never hurts to have a back-up plan.
